mission-config-unification.instruction: Analyze 'TD-166: Configuration Duality (Engine vs Agent)'. Currently, configuration is fragmented between engine-level settings and agent-level attributes. Propose a unified Configuration Management pattern that respects the ECS architecture.

mission-bloat-cleanup.instruction:
Refactor 'simulation/phases.py' and 'simulation/agents/government.py' to reduce bloating. Extract utility functions and configuration constants to dedicated modules. Focus on improving readability and reducing file size.

mission-bloat-cleanup.title: Clean Up Bloated Modules (TD-169)
